name: ThunderDawn
overview: ThunderDawn take the usual elements from RPG games and piles on the dark fantasy atmospherics. The result is a rather tasty full-screen experience. You are a brave hero-archer type who's been imprisoned in a sort of monster-infested maze by a rather unpleasant force. Your task is to escape by collecting a sufficient amount of Blood Crystals from the nests of a whole array of bone-rattling creatures.
